translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, please welcome the man
translation.zh: 各位先生女士 这位先生能预知你们的想法

translation.en: who knows what you're gonna do before you do it.
translation.zh: 这位先生能预知你们的想法

translation.en: The amazing Frank Cadillac!
translation.zh: 下面有请不可思议的弗兰克·凯迪拉克

translation.en: Here's to world peace.
translation.zh: 看这是什么

translation.en: Good evening. Welcome to beautiful downtown Las Vegas.
translation.zh: 晚上好欢迎来到美丽的拉斯维加斯城

translation.en: How many people are here from the Orient? Raise your hands.
translation.zh: 这里有多少人来自东方请举一下手

translation.en: -[man coughs] -You, sir. Where are you from?
translation.zh: 先生 请问你来自哪里？

translation.en: No, wait. Wait. Don't tell me. I'm sensing you must have soul.
translation.zh: 不要告诉我 我猜你是来自首尔

translation.en: You're a Seoul man.
translation.zh: 你肯定是首尔人

translation.en: Why don't you share with everyone where you're from?
translation.zh: 那么你愿意告诉我们你来自哪里吗？

translation.en: -Korea. -How about that, folks?
translation.zh: 韩国 说得不错吧

translation.en: And may I assume that this charming young lady is your daughter?
translation.zh: 这位迷人的小姐是你的女儿吧

translation.en: -She's my wife. -Well, of course she is!
translation.zh: 她是我的妻子 当然是的

translation.en: And what happens in Vegas stays in Vegas.
translation.zh: 发生在维加斯的 都留在维加斯

translation.en: -What's your name? -Yong Kyunge.
translation.zh: 你叫什么名字？ 永姜

translation.en: Yong Kyunge. Would you be kind enough to join me up on stage, please?
translation.zh: 永姜 可以上台和我一起做个表演吗？

translation.en: Are you serious about this guy? This a joke?
translation.zh: 对这个男人 你是说真的？这真是个笑话

translation.en: Want me to round up some mimes and clowns while we're at it?
translation.zh: 我们追踪这个马戏团的小丑

translation.en: [Cris] Yong Kyunge, what if I told you
translation.zh: 永姜 如果我告诉你

translation.en: that that pretty necklace you're wearing has a broken catch,
translation.zh: 你戴的那个漂亮的项链将会自己断开

translation.en: and on my count of three, will fall into your drink?
translation.zh: 我倒数三秒它就会掉到你手中的杯子里

translation.en: Wouldn't that be something? Wouldn't that just blow your mind?
translation.zh: 我倒数三秒它就会掉到你手中的杯子里 你不相信 是吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yes!
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Wouldn't it blow all your minds?
translation.zh: 你们都不会相信的 是吗？

translation.en: Three, two, one, now.
translation.zh: 三、二、一 断开

translation.en: -Did somebody say "spooky"? -[audience applauding]
translation.zh: 是不是有人说“真诡异”

translation.en: [Cris] Wait a minute. Look at your glass. Where'd it go?
translation.zh: 等一下 看看你的项链去哪了

translation.en: Yong Kyunge, why don't you look inside my pocket? Reach in. Dig deep.
translation.zh: 永姜 来看看我的口袋 摸到最深处

translation.en: Let's have a big hand for Yong Kyunge.
translation.zh: 给永姜来点掌声

translation.en: Well, that's magic, folks, and that's why I'm here.
translation.zh: 这就是魔术赋予我来此的原因

translation.en: [Cris] You've probably seen a lot of those shows.
translation.zh: 你可能已经看过很多这种表演了

translation.en: Mentalists, magicians, illusionists.
translation.zh: 通灵师、幻术师、魔术师都算是

translation.en: You'd be shocked to know that sometimes,
translation.zh: 你应该知道有时候 但不是经常

translation.en: not often, but sometimes, it's the real deal.
translation.zh: 你应该知道有时候 但不是经常 那可是货真价实的

translation.en: Masquerading as an act. Hiding behind a few 50-dollar tricks.
translation.zh: 魔术是一种艺术在那50块钱的入场券背后

translation.en: Hiding in plain sight.
translation.zh: 躲着玩些小把戏在表演时用来转移注意力

translation.en: Because if the magician doesn't do that,
translation.zh: 因为如果魔术师不这么做

translation.en: the alternative is impossible for others to live with.
translation.zh: 事情的真相是让其他人无法承受的

translation.en: Anyway, Wednesday night at the Back Page doesn't pay very well,
translation.zh: 不管怎么说周三晚上的演出薪水不高

translation.en: so I gamble.
translation.zh: 所以我去赌博

translation.en: But I don't play against other people. Only against the house.
translation.zh: 但是我不和其他人赌 只赢赌场的钱

translation.en: So, no mega-jackpots, no long shots.
translation.zh: 所以我不用出千 也不会瞎赌

translation.en: The idea is to go unnoticed. That way, I can keep coming back.
translation.zh: 只是多用头脑这就是我能常来这的原因

translation.en: I'm not a god. I can't see everyone's future.
translation.zh: 我不是上帝所以我不能看见每个人的未来

translation.en: Only my own. And only within two minutes.
translation.zh: 但是能看见自己的 只能提前两分钟

translation.en: Except for when I saw her. But we'll come back to that.
translation.zh: 除了当我看见她 这个一会再说

translation.en: [Roybal] There's no pattern to this guy. He's all over the map.
translation.zh: 这家伙一点模式都没有到处都有他的影子

translation.en: Well, he's not counting. Not off the top of a five-deck shoe.
translation.zh: 他没有算牌 但是他应该是作了手脚

translation.en: Wait a minute. Isn't that that two-bit magic act over at the Back Page?
translation.zh: 等一下这不是拉斯维加斯的那个魔术师吗？

translation.en: -What's his name? -Cadillac.
translation.zh: 他叫什么名字？ 凯迪拉克

translation.en: Yeah, that's Frank Cadillac.
translation.zh: 是的 弗兰克·凯迪拉克

translation.en: [Roybal] Is he pulling tricks on us? Is that legal?
translation.zh: 他是不是耍什么花招了？合法吗？

translation.en: You can't trick the deck.
translation.zh: 他不可能这么神不知鬼不觉的

translation.en: [Roybal] I'm telling you, that little prick knows what's coming.
translation.zh: 听好 他这家伙知道接下来会发生什么事

translation.en: If he's running that good a system, why is he not betting more?
translation.zh: 他既然都躲过监视器了为什么不赌大一点？

translation.en: That's gonna be my second question.
translation.zh: 这是我第二个疑问

translation.en: Look at that. He's looking right at us.
translation.zh: 看 他在看我们

translation.en: It's like he can hear us.
translation.zh: 好像他能听见我们说话

translation.en: -[Roybal] What table was that? -Twenty-seven.
translation.zh: 他是几号桌的？ 27号桌

translation.en: This is Roybal. Give me two men on table 27. I'm coming right down.
translation.zh: 27号桌有人出千 马上去看一下

translation.en: [dealer] Place your bets, please.
translation.zh: 请下注吧

translation.en: [Cris] Here's the thing about the future.
translation.zh: 未来还有一个特点

translation.en: Every time you look at it, it changes because you looked at it.
translation.zh: 每一次当你看到未来 它就会因此而改变 因为你看到了

translation.en: -Hi. -[Cris] And that changes everything else.
translation.zh: 之后其它事情也一起改变了

translation.en: [cashier] Nine thousand and seventy.
Empty the drawer. Move.
translation.zh: 把钱都拿出来 快点

translation.en: Drop the gun! Now!
translation.zh: 把枪放下来

translation.en: [cashier] Hi.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Nine thousand and seventy.
Drop the gun! Step back!
translation.zh: 把枪放下来 退后

translation.en: It's his gun. He was gonna shoot two people!
translation.zh: 是他的枪 他会打伤两个人

translation.en: Step back. We'll settle this right now. Hey!
translation.zh: 退后 混蛋

translation.en: [Davis] What's he doing?
translation.zh: 他在做什么？

translation.en: Secure the doors, elevators, escalators, every way out of this damn place. Now!
translation.zh: 监视安全门、电梯、楼梯 所有能通往外界的出口 快去

translation.en: [Davis] Freeman, seal off the blackjack tables. Sullivan, link up with Roybal.
translation.zh: 警卫 他到21点游戏桌那了去拦住他

translation.en: We're on the floor. On the floor right now.
translation.zh: 他就在这层

translation.en: Bring up the other cameras.
translation.zh: 把另外的监视器转过来

translation.en: That way. This way.
translation.zh: 你去那边 你去这边

translation.en: He's right next to you. Ten dollar slots, aisle 14.
translation.zh: 他就在你边上 14号老虎机

translation.en: [Davis] There he is. Behind you. Your left. Turn around!
translation.zh: 他在你后面 到左边了 转过头去

translation.en: He's right between you.
translation.zh: 就在你们中间

translation.en: He's in the men's room near the gift shop. Gift shop!
translation.zh: 他进男厕所了 礼品店 礼品店

translation.en: Davis, where the hell is he?
translation.zh: 大卫 他到底在哪里？

translation.en: Black T-shirt, straw hat. Heading towards the entrance.
translation.zh: 黑T恤、白帽子 朝入口去了

translation.en: Come on, let's go.
translation.zh: 我们走

translation.en: Call Vegas PD.
translation.zh: 通知警察

translation.en: Just stole a silver Charger, tag 585 G4S.
translation.zh: 他刚上了辆银色车车牌是585-G4S

translation.en: -[Roybal] Drop the gun! Step back. -It's his gun.
translation.zh: -放下武器 退后-枪是他的

translation.en: He rose to the top of our gambling fraud wish list about two months ago.
translation.zh: 他两个月前就在赌场赌钱了

translation.en: What he does has nothing to do with luck. It's definable ability.
translation.zh: 他所做的和运气无关是靠他天生具有的能力

translation.en: Look at him. He knows exactly what to do and not be caught.
translation.zh: 他都知道要怎么做才能避免被抓到

translation.en: Can you explain that to me?
translation.zh: 你能给我解释一下吗

translation.en: No, I can't explain it, Callie, nor do I have the time.
translation.zh: 我不能给你解释凯莉 我也没有这个时间

translation.en: The Russian Federation has a ten-kiloton nuclear munition unaccounted for.
translation.zh: 外界有一万吨核弹不知去向

translation.en: I understand that.
translation.zh: 我明白

translation.en: I'm not sure you do.
translation.zh: 我想你不明白

translation.en: We need every agent available beating the street.
translation.zh: 我们要每个能参与的探员四处打探

translation.en: That bomb was stolen five weeks ago. We've just been informed of it now.
translation.zh: 五周前导弹被偷我们刚刚才得到消息

translation.en: Which means it could be parked under this truck for all we know.
translation.zh: 也许现在就在这卡车底下也说不定

translation.en: I need actionable intelligence, not paranormals and bullshit magicians.
translation.zh: 我们需要确凿的情报 但不是去调查这种有超常能力的烂魔术师

translation.en: With all due respect, sir,
translation.zh: 这个烂魔术师知道将会发生的事情

translation.en: this bullshit magician's shown a pattern of advanced awareness
translation.zh: 这个烂魔术师知道将会发生的事情 这在统计学上是不可能的

translation.en: that is statistically impossible.
translation.zh: 这在统计学上是不可能的

translation.en: You let me bring him in, and you'll get what you want.
translation.zh: 你让我带他进来 我就能给你想要的

translation.en: Five days, Callie. That's it.
translation.zh: 只给你五天 就这样

translation.en: Get me the head of casino security.
translation.zh: 把赌场安全总监找来

translation.en: -You Roybal? -[enunciating] It's Roybal.
translation.zh: 你是罗伊贝尔 是罗伊巴尔

translation.en: Whatever.
translation.zh: 随你

translation.en: -Who are you? -Cavanaugh. Take a walk.
translation.zh: 你是谁？ 卡瓦诺 过来说话

translation.en: Hey, Roybal, this isn't a pissing contest. Come on.
translation.zh: 罗伊巴尔 就一会

translation.en: -What'd you do? You got a new car? -Stole it.
translation.zh: 你做了什么？你有了辆新车 偷的

translation.en: [Irv] Look at this.
translation.zh: 看看这个

translation.en: Twenty minutes to walk 20 steps.
translation.zh: 20分钟走20步

translation.en: Well, that's what you get from two packs a day.
translation.zh: 这就是你一天抽两包的结果

translation.en: Oh, hey, uh... Yeah.
translation.zh: 我给你带了两个三明治

translation.en: -I got you two sandwiches. -Two sandwiches?
translation.zh: 我给你带了两个三明治 该死 这要两万块钱啊

translation.en: -Ooh. That's 20 grand. -Come on, take it. I love you.
translation.zh: 该死 这要两万块钱啊 拿着吧 我喜欢

translation.en: Oh, jeez.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: How can I repay you?
translation.zh: 我怎么报答你呢？

translation.en: Must be a bitch to park this thing.
translation.zh: 这真是个庞然大物

translation.en: [Cavanaugh] Chief Roybal. Special Agent Ferris.
translation.zh: 他是罗伊巴尔特别探员凯莉·菲尔斯

translation.en: I'm sure Agent Cavanaugh has explained to you
translation.zh: 卡瓦诺探员和你说清楚了

translation.en: that everything you say is admissible in court
translation.zh: 你说的一切都不会上法庭的

translation.en: and anything you knowingly admit can be used against you.
translation.zh: 在这里你所看到的一切对外不可泄露

translation.en: Do we understand each other?
translation.zh: 否则对你不利 你明白吗？

translation.en: -Sure. -Tell me about Cris Johnson.
translation.zh: 好的 告诉我所有关于克里斯·约翰逊的事

translation.en: -I don't know who that is. -How about Frank Cadillac?
translation.zh: 我不知道他到底是谁 那就谈谈弗兰克·凯迪拉克

translation.en: You chased him out of your casino tonight.
translation.zh: 他今晚在你们赌场出千并偷了你们的车

translation.en: -He stole a car from valet parking. -Yeah, I know Cadillac.
translation.zh: 他今晚在你们赌场出千并偷了你们的车 我知道凯迪拉克

translation.en: I thought he was cheating us at cards. Next thing I know, he's tackling some guy and waving a gun.
translation.zh: 他除了出千、偷车还带枪攻击一个人

translation.en: Well, the gun wasn't his.
translation.zh: 那枪不是他的 是被他攻击的那人的

translation.en: The man he tackled is wanted for two casino killings in Reno.
translation.zh: 那枪不是他的 是被他攻击的那人的 现在已经被关押了

translation.en: He's in custody now.
translation.zh: 现在已经被关押了

translation.en: Come on, I want to show you something.
translation.zh: 过来 我给你看些东西

translation.en: You remember this?
translation.zh: 你记得这个吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I do. We were saying he's looking right at us.
translation.zh: 是的 当然记得 他像是从镜头里看到了我们

translation.en: -Hey, how'd you get this? -Well, think carefully.
translation.zh: 你们怎么搞到这个的？ 你仔细想想他向上看时 你们说了什么？

translation.en: What were you talking about right when he looked up?
translation.zh: 你仔细想想他向上看时 你们说了什么？

translation.en: We were saying, if he has a system, why isn't he betting more?
translation.zh: 我们说他既然逃过了我们的监控 为什么不赌大点

translation.en: You sure you weren't doing or saying anything else?
translation.zh: 没有说什么别的吗？

translation.en: I was going down to pick him up, I was reaching for my radio...
translation.zh: 之后我就低头看他是在哪张桌子了

translation.en: And right then? That's when he looked up? Be very specific.
translation.zh: 之后呢？他向上看是非常关键的

translation.en: That's what I said. He looked up, really.
translation.zh: 我就是说了那些 然后他就向上看了

translation.en: So he doesn't have to be there to do it. Once you enter his consciousness, he can pick it up.
translation.zh: 那么在他们要去抓他之前他已经溜掉了

translation.en: Is that to work his system?
translation.zh: 这些对你们有帮助吗？

translation.en: Thank you. We're finished.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 你可以走了

translation.en: Done some good here, Mr. Roybal, but none of it is up for discussion.
translation.zh: 做得很好 罗伊巴尔先生 要是有人问起 就说不知道有这个事

translation.en: Now, as far as you're concerned, Cris Johnson never existed.
translation.zh: 要是有人问起 就说不知道有这个事

translation.en: That's gonna be difficult considering 100 cameras saw him at the casino.
translation.zh: 我想很难 特别是知道你们 在赌场里有这么多的监视器

translation.en: Not to worry. Those tapes have been destroyed.
translation.zh: 别担心 带子都会被处理掉的

translation.en: Hey. Is she single?
translation.zh: 她单身吗？

translation.en: Cris, you can't keep stealing cars and having people chase you.
translation.zh: 凯迪拉克 你不能靠偷车 和让人追着你满街跑活着那不是人过的日子

translation.en: That's not a life.
translation.zh: 和让人追着你满街跑活着那不是人过的日子

translation.en: But you got to forget this girl that you keep seeing in your head.
translation.zh: 你就不能忘了那个你一直看到的女孩

translation.en: I'm not going anywhere until I meet her.
translation.zh: 我不会去任何地方 直到我遇见她

translation.en: Well, suppose she don't show up?
translation.zh: 万一她不出现呢？

translation.en: She already did, at the diner. Nine minutes after eight.
translation.zh: 她已经出现了在餐厅 我要在8点去见她

translation.en: Well, you got a couple hours. How about a game of pool?
translation.zh: 还有几小时 为什么不打两盘呢？

translation.en: All right, Irv. We'll shoot some pool.
translation.zh: 好的 就打几盘

translation.en: [man] We timed every hand of blackjack.
translation.zh: 我们计算了每手21点的时间

translation.en: The longest was 89 seconds, when Johnson pulled a six-card 21.
translation.zh: 最长的89秒约翰逊拿了六张牌 21点

translation.en: So we know he can see at least a minute and a half ahead.
translation.zh: 所以他至少可以看到一分半钟将要发生的事情

translation.en: I had our techs run a radio frequency spectrum analysis.
translation.zh: 我收到了无线电分析结果

translation.en: Came up dry. He's not receiving any form of electronic help.
translation.zh: 他什么都没有发现 他没有任何电子器具的帮助

translation.en: At one point, there was a two-minute 16-second delay.
translation.zh: 有一点 有2分16秒的延迟

translation.en: He never bet, just got up and walked away.
translation.zh: 什么都没有管 只是站起来走开了

translation.en: Well, maybe 2:16's too long. He can't see that far.
translation.zh: 也许2分16秒太长了 他看不到

translation.en: -Narrows our window a little bit, anyway. -[door opening]
translation.zh: 至少把时间搞准了一点

translation.en: Got him. Vegas PD got a LoJack hit on the stolen vehicle.
translation.zh: 找到他了 维加斯警察通过防盗追踪系统发现了他的行踪

translation.en: Okay. Listen, about that girl.
translation.zh: 好吧 话说那个丫头的事

translation.en: When you looked at the clock, did you happen to see a calendar?
translation.zh: 你光看手表 有没有看日历啊？

translation.en: Because it could be ten years from now she gets hungry.
translation.zh: 她说不定要十年后才会饿得跑去那家餐馆

translation.en: It's got to be soon.
translation.zh: 她马上就会出现了

translation.en: I've never seen further ahead than two minutes. Except for her.
translation.zh: 我从没有预见两分钟以外的事情除了她

translation.en: Now, what do you think the reason is for that?
translation.zh: 你有没有想过这是为什么

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe she doesn't scare easy.
translation.zh: 没有 也许她没有那么容易被吓到

translation.en: Maybe she's the one.
translation.zh: 也许她是我命中注定的人

translation.en: Well, when you get like this, there's no talking to you.
translation.zh: 要是你那么想 我就没什么好说的了

translation.en: She's almost here.
translation.zh: 她就要来了

translation.en: What happened to the diner?
translation.zh: 餐馆会发生什么事？

translation.en: -Somebody else, a cop. -A cop? Well, then, you got to go.
translation.zh: 还有别的人 警察 警察 那你快走

translation.en: Hold on. I want to see how much she knows. What she wants from me.
translation.zh: 等等 我想看看她知道什么她要什么

translation.en: Cris Johnson. Still here, huh?
translation.zh: 克里斯·约翰逊 你还在啊

translation.en: Where else would I be?
translation.zh: 我还能去哪呢？

translation.en: Special Agent Ferris. Next time, steal a car without LoJack.
translation.zh: 特别探员菲尔斯下次偷车你要小心点

translation.en: Can we speak privately?
translation.zh: 我们可以单独谈谈吗？

translation.en: Um, it's okay, Irv. Uh, go ahead. Thanks.
translation.zh: 好的 伊夫 走吧 谢谢

translation.en: I'm sure you know why I'm here.
translation.zh: 你肯定知道我来这里的原因

translation.en: Because you're the man who knows what I'm gonna do before I do it, right?
translation.zh: 因为你是能预先知道我要做什么的人 对吗？

translation.en: Oh, the show, right. Right.
translation.zh: 那个表演 对 对 我看见你在那儿

translation.en: I saw you there.
translation.zh: 对 我看见你在那儿

translation.en: Wonderful. You like magic tricks.
translation.zh: 多好啊 你喜欢魔术表演

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I do like your magic tricks, clairvoyance...
translation.zh: 是是 我是喜欢你那招

translation.en: Whatever you're calling it.
translation.zh: 你怎么叫来着？“预见未来”的表演

translation.en: Let's talk about something hard.
translation.zh: 我们谈谈正经事

translation.en: A stolen nuclear munition is being smuggled into the United States,
translation.zh: 有人走私了一批核弹运往美国

translation.en: or may, in fact, already be here.
translation.zh: 事实上现在已经到了

translation.en: I want you to look ahead and tell me where it's gonna be deployed.
translation.zh: 我想要你用一下你的能力 看看那些核弹被部署在哪

translation.en: [sighs] I think you've got the wrong guy. It's a... magic act.
translation.zh: 我想你找错人了 那只是魔术表演

translation.en: You gonna stick with that story? 'Cause millions of lives are at risk
translation.zh: 你还坚持那些说辞吗？成千上万的人将会丧命

translation.en: and you could, maybe, prevent a major catastrophe.
translation.zh: 你可能会预防一次重大的灾难

translation.en: On a practical note, we're standing in front of a stolen vehicle, and you are wanted for assault involving a weapon at the casino.
translation.zh: 现实点说 你偷了辆车还卷入赌场持枪事件

translation.en: [Cris] All right, that was an accident. He had a gun.
translation.zh: 那是个意外 -那个人有枪 而且会打伤两个人-是的

translation.en: -He was gonna shoot two people. -Yeah?
translation.zh: -那个人有枪 而且会打伤两个人-是的

translation.en: How'd you know that?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道的？

translation.en: No good deed goes unpunished, does it?
translation.zh: 是的 他应该受到惩罚

translation.en: I can fix your legal problems, buddy, but you've got to step up.
translation.zh: 我可以让你逃脱法律惩罚 但你必须站出来与我们合作

translation.en: Otherwise, your next magic show is gonna be at Folsom State Prison.
translation.zh: 不然你下一次表演就要在州立监狱里了

translation.en: It's ironic, but...
translation.zh: 听上去很讽刺

translation.en: people like you who try to help
translation.zh: 像你这样想帮助我的人对我来说是种折磨

translation.en: have been torturing me, in the full sense of the word, since I was three years old.
translation.zh: 像你这样想帮助我的人对我来说是种折磨 老老实实说 我三岁时

translation.en: What did they call it?
translation.zh: 他们叫什么来着？

translation.en: Uh... Oh, yeah. Observed play therapy.
translation.zh: 是的 观察游戏治疗

translation.en: Featuring the marathon, 36-hour, can-you-guess-the-next-flash-card game.
translation.zh: 搞一个36小时的“知不知道下一张牌”的游戏

translation.en: So, please, leave me alone...
translation.zh: 请你别再来找我了

translation.en: and let me live some semblance of a normal life.
translation.zh: 让我过上普通人的生活

translation.en: I'd love to indulge your feelings, but I am dealing with a slightly larger picture right now.
translation.zh: 我很想顾及你的生活但是我要有更大的顾虑

translation.en: Now, you can exercise your responsibility to help your fellow man,
translation.zh: 要么你尽你的职责来救你的同胞

translation.en: or I will exercise that responsibility for you.
translation.zh: 要么我尽我的职责来对付你

translation.en: You're right. I got to go.
translation.zh: 你是对的 我要走了

translation.en: He's gone, right?
translation.zh: 他走了 对吧？

translation.en: I missed him by seconds, didn't I?
translation.zh: 我失去机会了 对吗？

translation.en: Excuse me, honey, can you get off my car?
translation.zh: 对不起 亲爱的你能从我的车上下来吗？

translation.en: Yeah, thank you. Jeez.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢

translation.en: [Smith] Mr. Roybal?
translation.zh: 你是罗伊鲍

translation.en: [enunciating] It's Roybal. Can I help you, man?
translation.zh: 我叫罗伊巴尔 你有什么事吗？

translation.en: [Smith] I have a few questions if this is a good time.
translation.zh: 我有些问题要问你 现在是时候吗？

translation.en: Gaming Commission? It's after hours.
translation.zh: 赌博业管理委员会 我还以为你们这时候应该在脱衣酒吧呢 问吧

translation.en: You guys should be at a strip club, right? Come on.
translation.zh: 我还以为你们这时候应该在脱衣酒吧呢 问吧

translation.en: What can you tell us about Cris Johnson?
translation.zh: 你能告诉我们关于克里斯·约翰逊的事吗？

translation.en: I don't know who you're talking about.
translation.zh: 我不知道你在说什么

translation.en: Let me rephrase the question.
translation.zh: 我再重新问一遍

translation.en: -[waitress] Here you go, hon. -Thanks.
translation.zh: 给你菜单 谢谢

translation.en: Excuse me. Hello.
translation.zh: 打搅一下 你好

translation.en: I noticed you were alone, too. Do you mind if I join you?
translation.zh: 我注意到你是一个人来的介意一起坐吗？

translation.en: Actually, I do.
translation.zh: 事实上 我介意

translation.en: Oh...
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Sorry to bother you, but I have a question about the coffee.
translation.zh: 不好意思 打扰你一下但我对咖啡有点疑问

translation.en: The bean they use...
translation.zh: 他们用的咖啡豆…

translation.en: Isn't that something you should probably ask your waitress?
translation.zh: 这个问题你不应该问服务员吗？

translation.en: Yes, it is.
translation.zh: 是的 应该

translation.en: Excuse me, do you have a light?
translation.zh: 对不起 你有火吗？

translation.en: I don't smoke.
translation.zh: 我不抽烟

translation.en: -[waitress] Here you go, hon. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -给你菜单-谢谢

translation.en: Please. Don't.
translation.zh: 求你了 不要

translation.en: Hey, Liz.
translation.zh: 嗨 莉斯

translation.en: Did you follow me here, Kendall?
translation.zh: 你跟踪我到这

translation.en: No! No, I just thought we could talk.
translation.zh: 不是 我只是想我们谈谈

translation.en: We got really nothing to talk about.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我们真的没有什么好谈的

translation.en: And I told you that three weeks ago.
translation.zh: 我三周前就跟你说过了

translation.en: Liz, come on, all right? I-- I had an off day.
translation.zh: 莉斯 别这样 我只是一时糊涂

translation.en: Just give me another shot.
translation.zh: 再给我一次机会吧

translation.en: It's not gonna happen. Okay? So maybe you should just go.
translation.zh: 不可能 可以了 你还是走吧

translation.en: Do you know how hard it was to find you?
translation.zh: 你知道我多辛苦才找到你吗？

translation.en: [inhales sharply] I was at your apartment. I tried the Starbucks on Lexington.
translation.zh: 我去了你的公寓 莱克星顿的星巴克

translation.en: I was at the dry cleaner.
translation.zh: 还去了干洗店

translation.en: All I am asking for is a few minutes of your time
translation.zh: 我做的一切只是想要几分钟

translation.en: so that we can work things out.
translation.zh: 让我们能把问题解决

translation.en: -Okay, Jesus, you are stalking me now. -Don't...
translation.zh: 天啊 你果然跟踪我

translation.en: Don't say that, please. [stammers] That's a terrible thing to say -to somebody. -Ugh.
translation.zh: 别这么说 别说这么难听的话

translation.en: Let go of me, Kendall.
translation.zh: 放手 肯德尔

translation.en: Look, I just-- I thought we could talk, you know, maybe we could take a drive.
translation.zh: 我想我们能谈谈 也许我们能去开车兜兜风现在你把事情搞砸了

translation.en: And now you are ruining it.
translation.zh: 也许我们能去开车兜兜风现在你把事情搞砸了

translation.en: You're hurting me.
translation.zh: 你弄疼我了

translation.en: [Cris] Kendall, I think you're having another off day.
translation.zh: 肯德尔 我想你又一时糊涂了

translation.en: -Who the hell are you? -I'm her future.
translation.zh: 你到底是谁啊？ 我是她的未来

translation.en: Really? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Hi, my name's Cris.
translation.zh: 嗨 我叫克里斯

translation.en: You okay, Kendall?
translation.zh: 你还好吗 肯德尔？

translation.en: See, the thing is, I feel connected to you. -[grunts] -I don't know the reason why.
translation.zh: 我一直在想 为什么？

translation.en: -See, now, listen. -All right.
translation.zh: 现在听着 为了公平起见

translation.en: I think it's only fair that you pay for the lady's breakfast.
translation.zh: 现在听着 为了公平起见 你该为这位女士的早餐付账

translation.en: What were you having? Pecan pie is amazing.
translation.zh: 看他有多少零钱

translation.en: Excuse me, I can pay for my own breakfast.
translation.zh: 不好意思 我的早餐我自己能付

translation.en: And you know what? You two work things out.
translation.zh: 不如这样 这事你们俩自己解决吧？

translation.en: You're hurting me.
translation.zh: 你弄疼我了

translation.en: Kendall, I think you're having another off day.
translation.zh: 肯德尔 我想你又一时糊涂了

translation.en: -Who the hell are you? -I'm her future.
translation.zh: 你到底是谁 我是她的未来

translation.en: Really? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: -Incoming. -[grunts]
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: -[clatters] -[grunts]
translation.zh: 你看到了吗？

translation.en: Goddamn it! Kendall!
translation.zh: 天啊 肯德尔

translation.en: What? Don't blame me. This is your fault.
translation.zh: 不要怪我 都是你的错

translation.en: Get out of here! Will somebody please call the cops?
translation.zh: 滚出去 不然我叫警察了

translation.en: I am so sorry.
translation.zh: 我真抱歉 你还好吗？

translation.en: -Are you okay? Let me help you. -[stammers]
translation.zh: 我真抱歉 你还好吗？ 来吧 我来帮你 我帮你擦擦伤口

translation.en: Come on, let's get you cleaned up.
translation.zh: 来吧 我来帮你 我帮你擦擦伤口

translation.en: -[groans] -Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: [Cris] Oh, yeah, I'm seeing some stars.
translation.zh: 好了 我看见星星了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [scoffs] I'm Liz.
translation.zh: 我是莉斯

translation.en: Cris.
translation.zh: 我是克里斯

translation.en: [sighs] You must have a death wish getting involved in that.
translation.zh: 你竟然卷入这种事 你真是想死

translation.en: Here. Just...
translation.zh: 拿住

translation.en: -Okay. -Just...
translation.zh: 好的 你用手按一会

translation.en: -[inhales sharply] -Hold it there for a little bit.
translation.zh: 你用手按一会 好的

translation.en: -Okay. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: It will.
translation.zh: 你会的

translation.en: -What will? -Your luck. It's gonna change.
translation.zh: 我会什么？ 你会转运的

translation.en: [scoffs] What are you? A leprechaun?
translation.zh: 你是预言家吗？

translation.en: Do leprechauns get punched in the face or have their car stolen?
translation.zh: 预言家的脸会被打 车会被偷吗？

translation.en: Your car was stolen?
translation.zh: 你的车被偷了

translation.en: Yeah. I'm hoping they find it today.
translation.zh: 我希望他们今天能找到

translation.en: I'm supposed to be in Flagstaff.
translation.zh: 应该能找到吧

translation.en: Hey, is this-- Is this tooth loose here?
translation.zh: 这个牙松了吗？

translation.en: Uh, I don't know. I don't think so.
translation.zh: 不知道 没有啊

translation.en: Hurts.
translation.zh: 很痛

translation.en: Maybe I could give you a ride. I'm kind of going that way.
translation.zh: 也许我能带你一段 我也往那边

translation.en: That would really be helpful, Liz. Thank you.
translation.zh: 那真是太感谢了

translation.en: I do have to make a stop, though.
translation.zh: 我需要半路停一下

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: It might take a few hours, so if you're cool with that...
translation.zh: 如果你不介意的话我需要大概几小时

translation.en: Hey, look, if you're uncomfortable with this,
translation.zh: 如果不方便 我可以坐公车不要紧的

translation.en: -I'll take the bus. -No, no, no.
translation.zh: 如果不方便 我可以坐公车不要紧的 不要紧的 反正你不是变态

translation.en: [stammers] It's fine, it's fine. I mean, you're not a psycho.
translation.zh: 不要紧的 反正你不是变态

translation.en: Right?
translation.zh: 对吗？

translation.en: Because the first psycho vibe I get, you're out of the car.
translation.zh: 如果你是 我就扔你出去

translation.en: -Okay. Yes, ma'am. -[Liz] Okay.
translation.zh: 好的 小姐 好的

translation.en: -Deal. -["Así Será" plays]
translation.zh: 成交

translation.en: [sighs] Deal.
translation.zh: 成交

translation.en: It's amazing, isn't it?
translation.zh: 真是奇迹 不是吗？

translation.en: I end up in a diner where you are,
translation.zh: 我们同在一家餐馆里

translation.en: and we're both headed in the same direction.
translation.zh: 吃了点东西后 往同一个方向走

translation.en: [chuckles] I don't know if I would call it amazing, but...
translation.zh: 我不知道这算不算奇迹

translation.en: Destiny. That's what it really is.
translation.zh: 其实是命运

translation.en: Okay, I'm starting to get that psycho vibe.
translation.zh: 我有点受不了了

translation.en: Oh, no. You don't believe in destiny?
translation.zh: 不会吧？你不相信命运吗？

translation.en: Well, even if it does exist, I don't think I want to know.
translation.zh: 即便它真的存在 我也不想知道

translation.en: I mean, if every move we make is preordained,
translation.zh: 我是说你做的每一件事都是定好的

translation.en: then what is the point of that?
translation.zh: 那还有什么意思？

translation.en: I mean, life is supposed to be a surprise.
translation.zh: 生活应该充满惊喜

translation.en: Isn't it?
translation.zh: 不是吗？

translation.en: It would be nice.
translation.zh: 是不错

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [whispers] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: So he came in twice a day for a week at exactly nine past eight?
translation.zh: 这么说从上周起他每天8点09分准时来这里

translation.en: Yeah, he'd stay a few minutes, have a martini, and then he'd go.
translation.zh: 对 他待上几分钟喝点马提尼 然后离开

translation.en: 'Til today, when he met that lady.
translation.zh: 直到今天遇到那位小姐

translation.en: You didn't find anything strange about that?
translation.zh: 你们没有发现什么奇怪的事吗？

translation.en: Not strange enough to call the police.
translation.zh: 没有怪到叫警察

translation.en: We got a regular that counts the corn flakes in his bowl because it has to be an even number.
translation.zh: 如果遇到什么奇怪的事我们自然会告诉警方

translation.en: Got any cameras?
translation.zh: 有监视器吗？

translation.en: -Inside? No. -Outside?
translation.zh: 店里吗？没有 外面呢？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Did you notice what kind of car he was driving? Maybe overhear where they were going?
translation.zh: 你知道她开什么车吗？知道她要去哪里吗？

translation.en: I don't know what car, but they were headed up to Flagstaff.
translation.zh: 我不知道她开什么车 不过他们要去弗拉格斯塔夫他们是这么说的

translation.en: -Flagstaff. -That's what they said.
translation.zh: 不过他们要去弗拉格斯塔夫他们是这么说的

translation.en: Got another regular, she's always on a diet.
translation.zh: 他们喝的是普通的马提尼

translation.en: Brings in a scale and her own salad dressing.
translation.zh: 可能在节食吧 只放了一点糖

translation.en: -Thank you. -You're welcome.
translation.zh: 谢谢 不客气

translation.en: Guy knows we're after him, but he still risks coming here.
translation.zh: 这家伙知道我们在找他还冒险来这里

translation.en: -8:09, twice a day. -Doesn't even know if it's day or night.
translation.zh: 8、9点左右 一天两次 他每天都来啊他不知道是白天还是晚上

translation.en: Just the time. He was waiting for her.
translation.zh: 只知道是那个时间 他在等她

translation.en: All right, there's a traffic cam over there, a bank, a 7-Eleven across the street.
translation.zh: 好吧 那儿有个交通摄像头街对面有家银行

translation.en: Just run all the tapes. Maybe we'll get lucky
translation.zh: 看看所有的监视录像

translation.en: and catch him in wide.
translation.zh: 也许我们运气好 能看到什么

translation.en: Your buddy Roybal, the casino chief?
translation.zh: 你记得罗伊巴尔吗？那个赌场安全总监

translation.en: Had his throat cut last night after getting a kneecap shot off.
translation.zh: 被人抹脖子了 之前膝盖还中了一枪

translation.en: You're telling me this now? We just talked to him about Johnson.
translation.zh: 我们刚刚谈到约翰逊 你才告诉我

translation.en: -Hey, I just found out. -All right.
translation.zh: 我也是刚知道的 好吧

translation.en: -Local weapon? -Dead end.
translation.zh: 是这里买的枪吗？ 查不到

translation.en: And forensics came up empty. Not a hair, not a fiber.
translation.zh: 现场没有毛发 也没有指纹

translation.en: Somebody wants information.
translation.zh: 有人想要情报

translation.en: Now, the next time anything happens relative to Johnson,
translation.zh: 下次有任何关于约翰逊的事我要马上知道

translation.en: I want to know right away. I don't care if it's a paper cut.
translation.zh: 下次有任何关于约翰逊的事我要马上知道 就算是鸡毛蒜皮的事也好

translation.en: Okay, boss.
translation.zh: 好的 头儿

translation.en: The head of casino security, what did you learn from him?
translation.zh: 赌场的那个安全总监你从他那知道了什么？

translation.en: For a macho guy, he screams like a girl.
translation.zh: 像他那样一个大块头 叫得像女生

translation.en: But he was questioned by federal agents looking for Cris Johnson.
translation.zh: 他被一个联邦特工问询 特工在找克里斯·约翰逊 是吗？

translation.en: -Yes? -He said they haven't found him yet.
translation.zh: 特工在找克里斯·约翰逊 是吗？ 他说他们还没有找到

translation.en: Do you believe this shit?
translation.zh: 你相信这种事吗？

translation.en: He can see things before they happen?
translation.zh: 知道即将发生的事情

translation.en: It makes no difference what I believe.
translation.zh: 在我看来没有什么区别

translation.en: Look, we spent two years setting this up,
translation.zh: 听好 我们花了两年时间来计划整件事

translation.en: and that man out there is worried all this will be compromised by Johnson.
translation.zh: 那个人不放心 怕被约翰逊搞砸了

translation.en: We're wasting our time looking for some magician.
translation.zh: 我们在浪费时间去找什么魔术师

translation.en: We're being paid to secure the operation, Jones,
translation.zh: 我们的任务是保证行动安全

translation.en: not to hunt down some carnival barker.
translation.zh: 我们的任务是保证行动安全 保证不被抓到

translation.en: Really? Then why are the same authorities
translation.zh: 真的 为什么那些追查我们的特工也对他感兴趣？

translation.en: that are looking for us so interested in him?
translation.zh: 为什么那些追查我们的特工也对他感兴趣？

translation.en: Get rid of him.
translation.zh: 那就除掉他吧

translation.en: Do it now.
translation.zh: 马上去

translation.en: -[speaks in Havasupai] -Hey.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Havasupai Reservation. I teach here once a week.
translation.zh: 我们有个超级预约我每周来这儿上一次课

translation.en: The conditions are pretty lousy.
translation.zh: 教学条件相当差

translation.en: But it's in the Canyon, one of the Eight Wonders of the World.
translation.zh: 但这是在大峡谷 世界八大奇迹之一

translation.en: -Hey, Sam. -Hey, Liz.
translation.zh: -你好 山姆-你好 莉斯

translation.en: Well, a couple hundred years ago, this tribe was booming.
translation.zh: 几百年前 这个部落发展得不错

translation.en: Plenty of food and a thriving culture. They should be better off.
translation.zh: 物质丰富 文化繁荣 他们应该富足下去 但是…

translation.en: But I guess this was just their destiny.
translation.zh: 我猜可能是命运的安排吧

translation.en: I'd like to meet their shaman.
translation.zh: 我想去见他们这的萨满

translation.en: I read once that in many North American tribes
translation.zh: 有一次我读有关北美部落的书

translation.en: their shamans purpose wasn't only healing
translation.zh: 上面说萨满的工作是疗伤

translation.en: but they also claimed to have power over the atmosphere.
translation.zh: 但是他们还拥有创造环境的能力

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -To bring on or stop rain.
translation.zh: 比如带来降雨或停止它

translation.en: Even know future events.
translation.zh: 甚至预知未来

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Do you think that's possible?
translation.zh: 你认为这是有可能的事吗？

translation.en: Well, I believe anything is possible.
translation.zh: 我认为一切皆有可能

translation.en: Me, too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: -Whose birthday? -One of my students.
translation.zh: 谁的生日？ 我的一个学生

translation.en: Hey! Hi!
translation.zh: 嗨 你们好

translation.en: -How's it going? -[children laughing]
translation.zh: 过得怎么样？

translation.en: Hello! How is everybody? Good?
translation.zh: 大家都怎么样 好吗？

translation.en: -That's good. -Oh, I was close.
translation.zh: 说得很好 说得真好

translation.en: That was a lot. You messed up on the last part.
translation.zh: 不过最后一句不太对

translation.en: On the last part. Yeah. [laughs]
translation.zh: 最后一部分 是的

translation.en: I thought you weren't coming back until next Monday.
translation.zh: 我还以为你下周一才来呢

translation.en: Well, I'm not, but it's Jake's birthday. How could I miss that?
translation.zh: 是的 今天是杰克的生日我哪能错过

translation.en: Who's that man you're with?
translation.zh: 跟你一起来的男的是谁？

translation.en: Is he your boyfriend?
translation.zh: 是你男朋友吗？

translation.en: No, no, he's not my boyfriend. He's just my friend.
translation.zh: 不是 只是普通朋友

translation.en: I think he likes you.
translation.zh: 我觉得他喜欢你

translation.en: Well, why would you say that?
translation.zh: 为什么这么说？

translation.en: Because he looked at you like my brother looks at his girlfriend.
translation.zh: 凭他看你的眼神 跟我哥哥看他女朋友的眼神一个样

translation.en: Hey, Jake, you want to see some magic? I'll show you something. Come here.
translation.zh: 杰克 想看魔术吗？我给你表演 过来

translation.en: I found this rock out in the Canyon
translation.zh: 我在峡谷发现这块石头我要你拿着它

translation.en: and I want you to hold it because it's a magic rock.
translation.zh: 我在峡谷发现这块石头我要你拿着它 这可是一个魔石 握紧它 一直压着

translation.en: That's right. Hold it really tight. Keep squeezing.
translation.zh: 这可是一个魔石 握紧它 一直压着

translation.en: It's magic.
translation.zh: 开始显灵了

translation.en: He won't bite.
translation.zh: 它不咬人

translation.en: Happy birthday.
translation.zh: 生日快乐

translation.en: So, you're a magician?
translation.zh: 你是个魔术师吗？

translation.en: I have a small magic act back in Vegas.
translation.zh: 我在维加斯有个小的表演秀

translation.en: The Frank Cadillac Show.
translation.zh: 弗兰克·凯迪拉克秀

translation.en: -I thought your name was Cris. -It is.
translation.zh: 我还以为你叫克里斯

translation.en: Frank Cadillac is my stage name.
translation.zh: 我是叫克里斯弗兰克·凯迪拉克是我的艺名

translation.en: How did you come up with that?
translation.zh: 你怎么起那么个艺名？

translation.en: I picked two things I really liked and I put them together.
translation.zh: 我就是把自己喜欢的两样东西凑到一块

translation.en: Frankenstein and Cadillacs.
translation.zh: 弗兰肯斯坦和凯迪拉克汽车

translation.en: You are odd.
translation.zh: 你有点奇怪

translation.en: Charming... but odd.
translation.zh: 有魅力 只是有点奇怪

translation.en: [man] Cease fire! Visitor on the range!
translation.zh: 停火 离开射程

translation.en: Nice. A little close, though.
translation.zh: 不错 只是目标近了点

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 不错

translation.en: You were right about the traffic cam. We got a positive ID.
translation.zh: 你是对的我们从交通摄像上找到他了

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: Don't be.
translation.zh: 不用抱歉

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: Did I drool?
translation.zh: 我流口水了吗？

translation.en: -Drool? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -流口水？-是的

translation.en: Wha-- Drool? No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Oh, my God, it's coming down so hard.
translation.zh: 天啊 天好黑啊

translation.en: -Yeah. -[yawns]
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I like rain.
translation.zh: 我喜欢下雨

translation.en: I like rain, too.
translation.zh: 我也喜欢

translation.en: You know, once, I think it was in Denmark, it rained fish.
translation.zh: 有一天 可能是在丹麦天上下起了鱼雨

translation.en: Because the sun dehydrated the water and took it up into the atmosphere,
translation.zh: 太阳把水都蒸发了 水都变成了气体

translation.en: re-hydrated the fish eggs and they hatched and it rained fish.
translation.zh: 鱼卵都孵化出来了所以开始下起了鱼雨

translation.en: -Is that true? -Yeah, in the clouds.
translation.zh: 是真的吗？ 五十年前在云彩里发生的真事

translation.en: -[laughs] -True story. It happened 50 years ago.
translation.zh: 五十年前在云彩里发生的真事

translation.en: -I just felt like sharing that with you. -[both laugh]
translation.zh: 真希望你也在场

translation.en: Road's washed out ahead. You can't cross till morning.
translation.zh: 封路了 明天早晨才开放

translation.en: Not even then if this keeps up.
translation.zh: 如果还下这么大雨也不成

translation.en: You want to spin around and go back about two miles,
translation.zh: 你们最好调头走两英里 左转两下

translation.en: take your second left. There'll be a motel there called--
translation.zh: 你们最好调头走两英里 左转两下 有一个汽车旅馆 叫…

translation.en: The Cliffhanger. Thanks.
translation.zh: "绝岭雄风" 谢谢

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Him, right?
translation.zh: 是他吗？

translation.en: That's it? [clicks tongue]
translation.zh: 是他了 看不到正面的车牌 另一边怎么样？

translation.en: There's no front plate. Where's the other side?
translation.zh: 看不到正面的车牌 另一边怎么样？

translation.en: [Cavanaugh] I don't have it.
translation.zh: 没找到

translation.en: Wha-- What was that on the front window? Go back.
translation.zh: 车窗上是什么？回放

translation.en: Back, back.
translation.zh: 回放

translation.en: Back. There! Zoom in.
translation.zh: 回放 那里 放大

translation.en: That's a permit. Track it, you'll find her.
translation.zh: 是个许可证 去追踪她的下落

translation.en: I'll light a fire.
translation.zh: 我去生火

translation.en: Um, Cris, one little problem.
translation.zh: 克里斯 有一个小问题

translation.en: Oh, no, no. No, no, no. I'm gonna sleep in the car.
translation.zh: 不用 我去车里睡

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 行

translation.en: -Here. -Oh.
translation.zh: 拿着

translation.en: -Thanks. -Sure.
translation.zh: 谢谢 不客气

translation.en: Hey, did you hear the joke about the Zen master who ordered the hot dog?
translation.zh: 你听过这个笑话吗？ 一个禅宗信徒要了一个热狗

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不知道

translation.en: He said he'd have one with everything.
translation.zh: 他说要一个什么都有的热狗

translation.en: -Good night. -Good night.
translation.zh: 晚安 晚安

translation.en: What do we have?
translation.zh: 有什么消息？

translation.en: They're at the Cliffhanger Motel outside Flagstaff.
translation.zh: 他们住在弗拉格斯塔夫郊外的"绝岭雄风"汽车旅馆

translation.en: We found an Arizona DOT foreman who remembered the Land Cruiser.
translation.zh: 我们发现在亚利桑那州有个工头记得那辆陆虎

translation.en: -Why would he do that? -The road was flooded.
translation.zh: 他们怎么去那里了？ 路被冲了他刚刚想介绍个地方让他们过夜

translation.en: He was about to suggest a place to stay.
translation.zh: 路被冲了他刚刚想介绍个地方让他们过夜

translation.en: -But Johnson already knew. Right? -Exactly.
translation.zh: 但是约翰逊已经知道了 不是吗？ 当然

translation.en: Callie. It just got worse.
translation.zh: 凯莉 情况不妙

translation.en: All right, people, we've got a nuclear alert.
translation.zh: 大家听着 核弹警报 代码红色在加州南部地区

translation.en: Code Red, in the Southern California region.
translation.zh: 核弹警报 代码红色在加州南部地区

translation.en: L.A. to San Diego, 95 percent certainty.
translation.zh: 从洛山矶到圣地亚哥 95%确信度

translation.en: Nuclear emergency search teams are on the way, but until they get here,
translation.zh: 核弹紧急搜寻小组正在赶赴的路上 但他们到达之前

translation.en: can somebody please tell me what my agency, the FBI, is doing about it?
translation.zh: 有人能告诉我联邦调查局在干什么吗？

translation.en: Well, sir, tier-one suspects have been interrogated.
translation.zh: 两个主要疑犯正在接受审问

translation.en: Cars and premises have been checked, friends and acquaintances. We've opened up surveillance on tier-two and -three suspects,
translation.zh: 车辆已经检查过了我们正在监控两三个疑犯

translation.en: but nothing actionable yet.
translation.zh: 目前还没有实质性的进展

translation.en: Is that what we're doing, waiting for something actionable?
translation.zh: 我们没办法了吗？等待有什么实质性的进展？

translation.en: There are eight million lives that are precarious at best.
translation.zh: 这里有八百万人处在危险之中

translation.en: So I say we widen the net to "slightly suspicious"
translation.zh: 我建议我们应该撒开网任何疑犯都不放过

translation.en: and get some decent intel before this nuke blows up Los Angeles.
translation.zh: 我建议我们应该撒开网任何疑犯都不放过 在核弹爆炸之前找到一些有用的情报

translation.en: All right, Callie. What do you propose we do next?
translation.zh: 没错 凯莉 我们下一步该怎么办？

translation.en: I believe that the urgency of this situation
translation.zh: 我相信在紧急情况下

translation.en: compels the use of any and all resources to obtain Cris Johnson.
translation.zh: 我们不得不利用各种方法找到克里斯·约翰逊

translation.en: We know where he is. Let my team pick him up.
translation.zh: 我知道他在哪里 让我的人马去抓他

translation.en: [in English] He said they're mobilizing.
translation.zh: 他说大部队出发了

translation.en: Standard procedure when security is escalated.
translation.zh: 安全级别提高以后的标准行动

translation.en: Tell him to wrap it up. They'll lead us straight to Johnson.
translation.zh: 叫他盯着他们他们会带我们找到约翰逊

translation.en: -[in English] Okay. [speaks in French] -[phone beeps]
translation.zh: 好的 明白

translation.en: You hungry? There's a coffee shop down the road.
translation.zh: 你饿吗？路边就有一个咖啡厅

translation.en: [Cris] I'd rather eat here, if that's okay.
translation.zh: 我宁愿在这里吃

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -What? -[stammers]
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: There's an Italian painter named Carlotti,
translation.zh: 有一位意大利画家叫卡拉迪

translation.en: and, uh, [clears throat] he defined beauty.
translation.zh: 他理解的“美丽”

translation.en: He said it was the summation of the parts working together in such a way
translation.zh: 是不同的部位以一种方式集合在一起

translation.en: that nothing needed to be added, taken away or altered.
translation.zh: 无需添加 去除或者改变任何东西

translation.en: That's you.
translation.zh: 你就是这样

translation.en: You're beautiful.
translation.zh: 你很漂亮

translation.en: That was incredible.
translation.zh: 太不可思议了

translation.en: What was?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: This.
translation.zh: 这个

translation.en: Right here gives us a good standoff position
translation.zh: 在这里 在这个位置

translation.en: and open view of the front of the motel.
translation.zh: 就可以很好地观察汽车旅馆

translation.en: We can run multiple point and area surveillances from this road here, that turn out.
translation.zh: 让我们以这种阵形布控从这里到这里

translation.en: Get a team with a parabolic set right here.
translation.zh: 小组人马以弧型分布在这里

translation.en: That's fine, but I also want mobile surveillance.
translation.zh: 我需要移动监视岗位

translation.en: And give me two or three roamers. If he rabbits on us, -I want to be flexible. -[phone rings]
translation.zh: 给我两到三辆悍马如果他们跑了我就能跟上

translation.en: Ferris.
translation.zh: 我是菲尔斯

translation.en: Call the local police in Flagstaff.
translation.zh: 告诉弗拉格斯塔夫当地的警察

translation.en: Tell them to hold the outside perimeter.
translation.zh: 去布控范围以外的区域巡逻

translation.en: I want that area locked down.
translation.zh: 我希望那个地区处于封锁中

translation.en: A body turned up in an apartment with a line of sight to my office.
translation.zh: 我办公室对面的一座公寓里发现一具尸体

translation.en: Slit throat, like Roybal.
translation.zh: 喉咙被割 跟罗伊巴尔一样

translation.en: Somebody's trying to follow us to Johnson.
translation.zh: 有人正跟着我们寻找约翰逊

translation.en: [whispers] Cris.
translation.zh: 克里斯

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 什么事？

translation.en: Maybe there is such a thing as destiny.
translation.zh: 也许凡事都有宿命

translation.en: Give it 40 seconds.
translation.zh: 给她40秒

translation.en: So, after two minutes, he just stops seeing what's gonna happen?
translation.zh: 再过两分钟 他就看不到将发生什么

translation.en: I sure as hell hope so.
translation.zh: 不一定 我希望是

translation.en: Elizabeth Cooper?
translation.zh: 伊丽莎白·库珀

translation.en: -Yeah. -Federal Agent Ferris.
translation.zh: 是 联邦特工

translation.en: Um, what is this about?
translation.zh: 到底是怎么回事？

translation.en: I'm gonna need a few minutes of your time.
translation.zh: 我需要占用你几分钟

translation.en: Yeah, okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: They're putting her in the car.
translation.zh: 他们把她叫进车里

translation.en: [Roybal] Drop the gun! Step back.
translation.zh: 放下武器 退后

translation.en: [Cris] It's his gun. He was gonna shoot two people!
translation.zh: 是他的枪 他会打伤你的人

translation.en: This was three days ago?
translation.zh: 这是三天前发生的？

translation.en: He used you to get away from us in Vegas.
translation.zh: 这是在赌场里发生的 他利用你从拉斯维加斯跑掉

translation.en: You can be pretty sure that everything he told you is a lie.
translation.zh: 他对你所说的一切都是谎言

translation.en: He's delusional. A sociopath.
translation.zh: 他有妄想症 是个极端反社会的人

translation.en: [Liz] Oh, my God. [sighing] Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Oh, shit. [sighing] Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 该死的

translation.en: [Cavanaugh] Go back to the motel. Have a drink. Put one of these in his glass.
translation.zh: 回到汽车旅馆 让他喝一杯把药放进去

translation.en: It'll take five minutes to put him to sleep.
translation.zh: 五分钟就能昏迷他

translation.en: Then we'll come in and get him. Nobody's been hurt.
translation.zh: 我们就进去抓他 没有人会受伤

translation.en: But this is important. You need to do it at least two minutes
translation.zh: 但重要的是你必须在两分钟之内搞定

translation.en: after you get him out of the room.
translation.zh: 然后你再把他带出房间

translation.en: Wha-- [sighs] Why do you need me? Why can't you just get him?
translation.zh: 为什么你们要我做？你们去抓不就行了

translation.en: Liz, as I understand it, you work for a federally-funded program
translation.zh: 我知道你的工作 是受联邦基金资助的教学项目吧？

translation.en: teaching on various reservations. Is that true?
translation.zh: 是受联邦基金资助的教学项目吧？

translation.en: Yes, that's true.
translation.zh: 是 没错

translation.en: Well, I'd think you'd be eager to help us. We're on the same team.
translation.zh: 我想你会帮我们的 我们是一家人

translation.en: Now they're letting her go.
translation.zh: 现在他们放她走了

translation.en: -Uh, thanks for the note. -Sure.
translation.zh: 谢谢你留条了 不谢

translation.en: [sighs] Did you have a nice walk?
translation.zh: 散步散得如何？

translation.en: I did. You know, it's-- It's really beautiful here. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 环境不错

translation.en: -I have a present for you. -Oh.
translation.zh: 我给你买了礼物

translation.en: -Oh, thanks. Hey. I need that. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我正需要这些 对

translation.en: Is something wrong?
translation.zh: 出什么事了？

translation.en: Oh, no, no, I'm fine.
translation.zh: 没事

translation.en: Why don't you go wash up, and I'm gonna make us breakfast.
translation.zh: 去洗个澡吧 我来做早餐

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Forty-five seconds.
translation.zh: 45秒了

translation.en: A minute-thirty.
translation.zh: 1分30秒

translation.en: And that's two.
translation.zh: 两分钟了

translation.en: -Looks good. -You think so?
translation.zh: -看起来不错-真的吗？

translation.en: -Thank you. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [sighs] Don't drink that!
translation.zh: 别喝 下过药了

translation.en: [crying] Oh, God, I don't know what I'm doing. I have no idea what I'm doing.
translation.zh: 天啊 我现在不知所措

translation.en: Some federal agent came up to me
translation.zh: 一些联邦特工找到我

translation.en: and said that you were a delusional sociopath
translation.zh: 说你有妄想症 极端反社会的人

translation.en: and showed me this tape. So maybe you are.
translation.zh: 他们还给我看录像也许你是他们说的那种人

translation.en: But I don't wanna believe that. I don't think I can believe that.
translation.zh: 但我不愿意相信那是真的

translation.en: And she also said that if you ran, they would shoot you.
translation.zh: 他们还说如果你跑 他们会开枪

translation.en: So I should drug you instead and I, uh...
translation.zh: 所以我只能给你下药

translation.en: Even if what they said is true, I don't want you to die.
translation.zh: 即便他们说的是真的我也不希望你死

translation.en: [inhales] I don't want you to die.
translation.zh: 我不要你死

translation.en: [whispering] Cris, is it true?
translation.zh: 克里斯 这是真的吗？

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Get me broadband noise reduction. I don't like hearin' this!
translation.zh: 给我多频降噪处理一下我不喜欢听这些

translation.en: Speak quietly and act normally.
translation.zh: 慢慢说 表现正常一点

translation.en: How long did they say the drugs would take?
translation.zh: 他们说这药什么时候起作用？

translation.en: -that left. -About five minutes.
translation.zh: 大概五分钟

translation.en: What is he doing?
translation.zh: 他在干什么？

translation.en: [Cavanaugh] He's drinking. Give it a minute.
translation.zh: 喝东西 等一下

translation.en: Got a clean shot?
translation.zh: 能瞄准吗？

translation.en: Not yet.
translation.zh: 还不成

translation.en: The man in that casino would have killed two people.
translation.zh: 赌场里的那个人差点杀了两个人

translation.en: It happened. It just hadn't happened yet.
translation.zh: 那是肯定会发生的事只不过还没发生罢了

translation.en: [whispering] Oh, my God, you are delusional.
translation.zh: 天啊 你还真有妄想症

translation.en: "Fluffy cranberry or a stack of chocolate chip pancakes for the kids."
translation.zh: 给孩子们松软的小红莓 或是实惠的巧克力薄煎饼

translation.en: [man on TV 1] Fluffy cranberry
translation.zh: 给孩子们松软的小红莓

translation.en: or a stack of chocolate chip pancakes for the kids in an instant.
translation.zh: 或是实惠的巧克力薄煎饼

translation.en: "Safe? Who knows what's safe?
translation.zh: 安全？谁知道安全在哪里？

translation.en: I knew a man who dropped dead from looking at his wife."
translation.zh: 我认识一个人死的时候还看着他的妻子

translation.en: Safe. Who knows what's safe?
translation.zh: 安全？谁知道安全在哪里？

translation.en: -[sighs] -I knew a man dropped dead from looking at his wife.
translation.zh: 我认识一个人死的时候还看着他的妻子

translation.en: "You can't get lost in the woods if you never go into the woods."
translation.zh: 如果你永远不进树林 你就永远不会在树林里迷路

translation.en: You can't get lost in the woods if you never go into the woods.
translation.zh: 如果你永远不进树林 你就永远不会在树林里迷路

translation.en: [cartoon character] Boy, you got an answer for everything.
translation.zh: 伙计 你无所不知

translation.en: "That's right, sir. You're the only person authorized to do so."
translation.zh: 没错 你是唯一有权力这么做的人

translation.en: Uh, that's right, sir. You are the only person authorized to do so.
translation.zh: 没错 你是唯一有权力这么做的人

translation.en: How are you doing this?
translation.zh: 你是怎么做到的？

translation.en: I have no idea how, but I can.
translation.zh: 我也不知道是怎么做到的但是我能做到

translation.en: I was born with it.
translation.zh: 与生俱来的

translation.en: [chuckles] Is this some kind of a trick?
translation.zh: 这是一种把戏吗？

translation.en: You know we don't have time for that.
translation.zh: 你知道我们没闲功夫做那些

translation.en: You said anything was possible.
translation.zh: 你说一切皆有可能

translation.en: So, you see things before they happen?
translation.zh: 这样说来 你能看到即将发生的事情

translation.en: You see the future?
translation.zh: -你能看到将来-我的将来

translation.en: My future. What'll affect me, and only two minutes ahead.
translation.zh: -你能看到将来-我的将来 与我有关的 只能提前两分钟看到

translation.en: Except you. For some reason, I saw you.
translation.zh: 除了你 因为某些原因我看到了你

translation.en: I-- For some reason,
translation.zh: 因为某些原因我看到了你

translation.en: I saw you far beyond anything I'd ever seen before and I don't know why.
translation.zh: 因为某些原因我看到了你 与我以前看到的东西远远不同 我不知道是为什么

translation.en: What do you mean, you saw me?
translation.zh: 什么意思？你看到了我？

translation.en: You've been-- You've been doing that to me?
translation.zh: 你已经…你对我做过什么了？

translation.en: That-- That you know what I'm gonna do and what I'm gonna say,
translation.zh: 你知道我要干什么、我要说什么

translation.en: -that you've just been setting me up? -No, I haven't.
translation.zh: 你就是把我带进骗局？ 不是 我没有

translation.en: I wanted to find you because I needed to know why I was seeing you.
translation.zh: 我想办法找到你 是因为我想知道为什么我一直看到你

translation.en: -And-- and because I-- I... [sighs] -[gasps]
translation.zh: 因为我…

translation.en: It wasn't a setup.
translation.zh: 这不是骗局

translation.en: What do they want from you?
translation.zh: 他们想从你这里得到什么？

translation.en: They think I can help them in matters of national security.
translation.zh: 他们认为我能为国家安全帮上忙

translation.en: [whispering] I don't understand. If you can help, then why don't you?
translation.zh: 我不明白如果你能帮 为什么不帮？

translation.en: Because I can't.
translation.zh: 因为我帮不了

translation.en: I can only give 'em a two-minute head start.
translation.zh: 我只能知道两分钟后的事情

translation.en: And that's if my life is personally involved.
translation.zh: 而且是与我有关的事情

translation.en: -But with me, you can see further. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 但跟我在一起 你能看到未来？ 是的

translation.en: But they don't know that.
translation.zh: 他们还不知道

translation.en: There's almost ten thousand dollars in this envelope.
translation.zh: 这个信封里有将近一万美元

translation.en: They know about you. You need to get away from here.
translation.zh: 他们认得你了 你得离开这里

translation.en: [Cris] What time do you have?
translation.zh: 你的表是几点？

translation.en: -9:10. -Set your watch to 9:17.
translation.zh: 9点10分 调到9点17分

translation.en: Read this when I leave and wait exactly 45 seconds
translation.zh: 我离开后看这个 然后等时间 准确地过了45秒后 就照上面的做

translation.en: before you do what it says. I'll take Ferris with me.
translation.zh: 准确地过了45秒后 就照上面的做 我会带上菲尔斯

translation.en: It might be a week or a month,
translation.zh: 我可能离开一周或一个月

translation.en: but if you can wait, I'll find you.
translation.zh: 你等着我 我会去找到你的

translation.en: Something's wrong.
translation.zh: 不对劲

translation.en: Don't do it.
translation.zh: 不要

translation.en: I already have.
translation.zh: 我已经做了

translation.en: Go get him! Alive!
translation.zh: 走 去抓他 要活的

translation.en: -[JTTF agent 1] Let's go! -[JTTF agent 2 indistinct chatter]
translation.zh: 快走

translation.en: -[speaks in French] -[grunts]
translation.zh: 混蛋

translation.en: Are you crazy?
translation.zh: 克里斯

translation.en: [JTTF agent 1] Oh, shit! Come on! [JTTF agent 1] Go! Get the fuck--
translation.zh: 该死 快跑

translation.en: [Ferris] Johnson!
translation.zh: 约翰逊

translation.en: You know you're not gonna shoot.
translation.zh: 你不会开枪的

translation.en: You gonna let me die?
translation.zh: 你会杀了我

translation.en: Hey, I need some help! -[Ferris] Let's get him out of here! -[grunting, panting]
translation.zh: 我需要帮助 把他拉出来

translation.en: -Ferris] Let's get him out of here. -[Cavanaugh grunting] I got him.
translation.zh: 把他拉出来 抓住你了

translation.en: You all right? You okay? Open your eyes. Look at me.
translation.zh: 你没事吧？睁开眼 看着我

translation.en: No good deed goes unpunished, does it?
translation.zh: 好事是要付出代价的 不是吗？

translation.en: -She got him. -Now what?
translation.zh: 他抓到他了 现在怎么办？

translation.en: -[cellphone rings] -[Mr. Smith] You see her?
translation.zh: 你看见她了吗？

translation.en: Smoke?
translation.zh: 抽烟吗？

translation.en: Thanks for today.
translation.zh: 今天的事情谢谢你

translation.en: Could've let me die. I appreciate it.
translation.zh: 你没让我死掉 我很感谢

translation.en: That was a real show of character.
translation.zh: 你本性不坏

translation.en: I know I seem like the bad guy in all this,
translation.zh: 我知道我看着不像好人 但为保证大家的自由我不得已而为之

translation.en: but in the interests of preserving our freedom,
translation.zh: 但为保证大家的自由我不得已而为之

translation.en: there are larger issues at play.
translation.zh: 我有更重要的事情

translation.en: What about my freedom?
translation.zh: 那我的自由算什么？

translation.en: With freedom comes responsibility.
translation.zh: 要想自由就要担负责任

translation.en: I... have rights.
translation.zh: 我有我的权利

translation.en: This isn't about you. This is about eight million other people.
translation.zh: 这不仅仅是你一个人的事 这关系到其他八百万人的性命

translation.en: [panting] If I do what you want, you'll keep me in this chair forever.
translation.zh: 你想要怎么样？把我永远困在这椅子上吗？

translation.en: There is a nuclear bomb somewhere in Los Angeles.
translation.zh: 洛杉矶某处有个核弹

translation.en: And every television station in the world will broadcast
translation.zh: 世界上每家电视台 都会报导这次爆炸的具体细节

translation.en: the precise details of its detonation.
translation.zh: 都会报导这次爆炸的具体细节

translation.en: So, go on push that two minutes as far as you can. And find it.
translation.zh: 所以尽量把这两分钟推得远些 找到那个核弹

translation.en: [male news anchor] We're interrupting your broadcast this afternoon for breaking news out of downtown Los Angeles.
translation.zh: 下面为您报导来自洛杉矶市区的突发新闻

translation.en: Most of the nation's largest technology corporations oppose this idea
translation.zh: 最大的技术公司反对这一提议

translation.en: and tech lobbying is blamed for stalling the proposed [distorted] rate structure.
translation.zh: 而科技公司的说客责怪

translation.en: ...members of the LAPD bomb squad are staging in that area.
translation.zh: 洛杉矶警察炸弹小队驻扎在这一区域

translation.en: We want to go live now to reporter Lisa Joyner
translation.zh: 下面是来自丽萨·乔伊纳最新的现场报道

translation.en: at the scene for the very latest. Lisa.
translation.zh: 下面是来自丽萨·乔伊纳最新的现场报道 丽萨

translation.en: Jeff, the standoff began when police received an anonymous phone call
translation.zh: 就在这一切发生前警方接到了一通匿名电话

translation.en: stating that explosives would be detonated at this parking garage
translation.zh: 声称一枚炸弹将于6点 在这个百老汇停车场内爆炸

translation.en: at Second and Broadway at six o'clock tonight.
translation.zh: 在这个百老汇停车场内爆炸

translation.en: There's no, uh-- They have no idea on a motive.
translation.zh: 犯罪分子的目的与动机不明

translation.en: [Lisa] The, uh, victim, however, -has been identified... -Liz, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -但是受害者-莉斯 我真对不起你

translation.en: -...as Elizabeth Cooper of Las Vegas. -What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: -Now, earlier in our coverage you... -What did you say?
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: ...saw the LAPD has surrounded the area. They've secured a perimeter.
translation.zh: 洛城警方已经封锁了这片区域

translation.en: But now the bomb squad is making their way onto the, uh, [stammers] the deck of this building.
translation.zh: 拆弹组也在向炸弹处靠近

translation.en: And the men... men that are walking up with black suits on and such...
translation.zh: 视野内有穿黑套装的人在向前移动

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Um... Th-- There's been-- There's been an explosion.
translation.zh: 发生了爆炸？

translation.en: -There's been an explosion. Uh... -[panting]
translation.zh: 发生了爆炸？ 天啊

translation.en: The-- The victim has been identified as Elizabeth Cooper of Las Vegas.
translation.zh: 遇害者的身份已经确认 是来自拉斯维加斯的伊丽莎白·库珀

translation.en: And, uh, she was, uh, strapped to a, uh, wheelchair.
translation.zh: 她被绑在一张轮椅上

translation.en: Sorry?
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: Approximately ten percent of U.S. workers receive stock options.
translation.zh: 10%美国工人收到了这些认股权

translation.en: Many technology companies give the options away as part of their...
translation.zh: 许多技术公司将会…

translation.en: Tell me what just happened.
translation.zh: 告诉我发生了什么事？

translation.en: Yeah, I-- I can't. It won't work like this.
translation.zh: 不行 这样可不行 这是没有用的

translation.en: Just get me out of this room, and I'll do what you want.
translation.zh: 让我离开这里 我愿意和你们合作

translation.en: I beg you, please get me out of this room.
translation.zh: 求你了 让我离开这房间

translation.en: -Let him out! -[panting]
translation.zh: 让他出去

translation.en: -Callie! Callie, wait up. -What?
translation.zh: 凯莉 等等 怎么了？

translation.en: Forensics report on Betty Peterson.
translation.zh: 这是贝蒂·彼得斯的残留物检测报告

translation.en: The dead girl in the apartment?
translation.zh: 就是那个死在公寓里的女子

translation.en: Her throat was cut, bled out. Otherwise, nothin' to DNA.
translation.zh: 她被割喉死的现场没有留下任何可疑的基因信息

translation.en: The place was immaculate again. How'd it go with Johnson?
translation.zh: 她被割喉死的现场没有留下任何可疑的基因信息 约翰逊那边怎么样了？

translation.en: Well, something happened, but he's not sharing.
translation.zh: 确实发生了大事 但他还是不肯说

translation.en: You know, there are traces of potassium iodide.
translation.zh: 查到有钾同位素

translation.en: Some medication Peterson was taking?
translation.zh: 约翰逊在接受什么治疗？

translation.en: -They found an empty pillbox. -No.
translation.zh: 那个药盒是怎么回事？ 吃那东西的唯一目的就是预防核辐射

translation.en: The only reason to take it is to prevent radiation poisoning.
translation.zh: 吃那东西的唯一目的就是预防核辐射

translation.en: Oh, hey, wait, wait. Can I get a smoke or something? I need to relax.
translation.zh: 等等 能给支烟吗？

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Oh, hey, can I get a light?
translation.zh: 能再借个火吗？

translation.en: [pilot] Base, Air One. Base, Air One. I've got visual.
translation.zh: 海湾一号 我看到了

translation.en: Subject is spotted heading south on 5th Street.
translation.zh: 嫌犯出现在南区

translation.en: Be advised, subject is turning east onto Broadway.
translation.zh: 嫌犯正向东往百老汇方向逃跑

translation.en: Stay here. Let me deal with this.
translation.zh: 待在这 交给我处理

translation.en: Why are you here?
translation.zh: 你在这干吗？

translation.en: They killed her.
translation.zh: 他们杀了她

translation.en: Two hours from now.
translation.zh: 两小时后

translation.en: They killed Liz.
translation.zh: 他们杀了莉斯

translation.en: Tell me what you saw.
translation.zh: 告诉我 你看到了什么？

translation.en: I saw them execute her.
translation.zh: 看到他们杀了她

translation.en: Right there. On the roof.
translation.zh: 就在那 在屋顶上

translation.en: It hasn't happened yet, and I know who has her.
translation.zh: 还没有发生 我知道她在谁那里

translation.en: It's the same people we're after.
translation.zh: 我们正在找的那些人

translation.en: There's a reason that they brought you here. They're using Liz as bait.
translation.zh: 她是个诱饵 只是为了吸引你出现

translation.en: Ten to one you go out on that roof, they're going to put a bullet in your brain.
translation.zh: 你一踏上那屋顶 头上就会中一枪

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: Right now, she's still alive.
translation.zh: 起码她现在还活着

translation.en: She is, you are, we all are. Let's try to keep it that way.
translation.zh: 她活着 你活着 我们都还活着 不要改变这个状况

translation.en: I help you, you help me, all right?
translation.zh: 我帮助你 你帮助我 好吗？

translation.en: I want a two-mile radius. Every telephone grid, shortwave, cell tower. Shut it down.
translation.zh: 三公里内的所有广播、手机信号短波、信号塔 全部关闭

translation.en: What do you want me to do?
translation.zh: 你要我做什么？

translation.en: Let him shoot you.
translation.zh: 让他们杀了你

translation.en: [operator] Your call cannot be completed as dialed. Check the number and dial again.
translation.zh: 呼叫暂时无法接通请检查号码后重试

translation.en: [operator] Your call cannot be completed as dialed.
translation.zh: 呼叫暂时无法接通

translation.en: -[whirring] -FBI! Down on your knees!
translation.zh: 联邦调查局 不许动

translation.en: [Callie] You okay? That looked pretty close.
translation.zh: 你还好吗？ 表演得不错

translation.en: Sleight of hand.
translation.zh: 给他们露一手

translation.en: -You didn't get him. -Not alive. He fired on the chopper.
translation.zh: 你没抓到他 没抓到活的 我们在上面开火了

translation.en: But it doesn't matter. He couldn't call in the hit.
translation.zh: 那没有关系 他联系不到他老大了

translation.en: So as far as they're concerned, you're not here yet.
translation.zh: 据我们所知 他也听不到那枪声

translation.en: It buys us time.
translation.zh: 我们争取到了时间

translation.en: Every way I try this, she still ends up dead.
translation.zh: 我试图去改变一切 但她还是死了

translation.en: What if you do it earlier?
translation.zh: 那之前发生了什么事？

translation.en: They have to bring her here in a vehicle, right?
translation.zh: 他们是开车带她过来的吧？

translation.en: -Looking for a license plate. -Right.
translation.zh: 我在回想车牌号码

translation.en: Can you see it?
translation.zh: 看到了吗？

translation.en: It helps if you don't speak right now.
translation.zh: 你要是不吵我 刚才我就可以看到了

translation.en: California plate number 50KF272.
translation.zh: 加州车牌 50KF272

translation.en: California tag, five, zero, kilo, foxtrot, two, seven, two.
translation.zh: 加州车牌 50KF272

translation.en: -Please, where are you taking me? -[speaking in German]
translation.zh: 求你们 你们要带我去哪？ 人交给你了 看你的了 好的 交给我

translation.en: What do you want with me?
translation.zh: 你们到底要对我做什么？

translation.en: Who the hell are you people?
translation.zh: 你们到底是什么人？

translation.en: Sitrep, Cavanaugh.
translation.zh: 准备好了吗 卡瓦诺？

translation.en: Local SWAT has been deployed
translation.zh: 特警已经部署完毕

translation.en: and the regional team just showed to back us up.
translation.zh: 后援已安排到位

translation.en: All right, listen up.
translation.zh: 伊丽莎白·库珀的车会在五分钟内抵达这里

translation.en: A van carrying Elizabeth Cooper will exit the warehouse
translation.zh: 伊丽莎白·库珀的车会在五分钟内抵达这里 会从这个仓库里出来

translation.en: across from Pier 18 compound in approximately five minutes.
translation.zh: 穿过这里 18个箱子 大约五分钟

translation.en: Four minutes and 27 seconds.
translation.zh: 4分27秒 不介意吧？

translation.en: -Do you mind? -Not anymore. Go ahead.
translation.zh: 没事 你继续

translation.en: They've got her wrapped in explosives, wired to a cell phone.
translation.zh: 炸弹预先设置为手机引爆

translation.en: Remote trigger. Another cell phone sets it off. Usually a one-button speed dial.
translation.zh: 远程引爆 采用快速拨号的方式遥控

translation.en: They'll take this route to the entrance gate.
translation.zh: 他们会从这条路出现

translation.en: At that point, Alpha and Bravo will swarm the entrance--
translation.zh: 这里 A队和B队采取…

translation.en: If you could just be quiet and do exactly what I say,
translation.zh: 安静 你们按照我说的做

translation.en: I'll save your life.
translation.zh: 我保证你们活命

translation.en: We need to stop the vehicle here before they get through the gates.
translation.zh: 我们得在可疑车辆经过大门前拦截下来

translation.en: Alpha and Bravo will hold and contain here.
translation.zh: A队和B队在这里原地待命

translation.en: Sniper teams will initiate on Johnson's call.
translation.zh: 听从约翰逊的口令

translation.en: On his call. Are we clear?
translation.zh: 听从约翰逊的口令 明白了吗？

translation.en: -All elements shoot to kill any hostiles. -What about intel?
translation.zh: 可以击毙敌人 其它情报呢？

translation.en: We don't need them. We have him.
translation.zh: 不需要了 我们有他

translation.en: All right, everybody! Let's go!
translation.zh: 好了 各位 行动起来

translation.en: -Go! Let's go! Move! -[gunfire]
translation.zh: 上 快开火

translation.en: -Back up! -[sirens blaring]
translation.zh: 后退

translation.en: Go, go, go!
translation.zh: 行动 快上

translation.en: -[agent] Stop the van. -Not yet. You'll kill her.
translation.zh: 拦截它 不是现在 会伤到她的

translation.en: -Now. -[gunfire]
translation.zh: 就是现在

translation.en: [pilot] You're good to go! Now!
translation.zh: 上啊

translation.en: Move back! Move back!
translation.zh: 退后 退后

translation.en: Take out the guy on the crane, northeast corner.
translation.zh: 把西北角房顶上的那个人解决掉

translation.en: -Negative on a visual. -Give me that.
translation.zh: 不行 看不到 给我

translation.en: [Cris] Aim for the doorway, eight inches above the guardrail.
translation.zh: 门缝那里 大概离护栏八英寸

translation.en: On me, let's go!
translation.zh: 快上

translation.en: -[speaks in German] -[gun cocks]
translation.zh: 我去那边

translation.en: [JTTF sniper] Zed David, Charlie One at entry point.
translation.zh: 大卫 查理 向入口行进

translation.en: Turn right.
translation.zh: 右转

translation.en: You're clear.
translation.zh: 安全

translation.en: [pilot] You're good! Go! Go!
translation.zh: 快点 行动

translation.en: Come on! Let's go! Let's go!
translation.zh: 行动 快上

translation.en: [pilot] Number 2 loading dock.
translation.zh: 注意你左边

translation.en: Stop.
translation.zh: 停

translation.en: -No! -[groaning]
translation.zh: 不要

translation.en: Go.
translation.zh: 上

translation.en: [sniper] This is Charlie One element, moving and clearing, over.
translation.zh: 这是查理一组 安全 完毕

translation.en: [whispers] Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: There are explosives there, there and there. Stay close.
translation.zh: 这边 那边 还有那边都安置了炸药大家靠近点

translation.en: -Sniper. -Where?
translation.zh: 狙击手 -哪里？-狙击手 我们后面

translation.en: -Behind us. -Sniper, six o'clock.
translation.zh: -哪里？-狙击手 我们后面 看到在哪了吗？

translation.en: -Got a visual? -Nobody move! I'll find him.
translation.zh: 大家都别动 我会找到他

translation.en: Catwalk, second level.
translation.zh: 二楼过道

translation.en: Catwalk, six o'clock. Second level.
translation.zh: 二楼六点钟方向的过道

translation.en: -Got him. -[gunfire]
translation.zh: 看到了

translation.en: -We'll have to clear this deck by deck. -You take this one. I'll do the rest.
translation.zh: 我们一个甲板一个甲板地搜 你们搜这一个 其他的我来

translation.en: Let's sweep and clear.
translation.zh: 清除干净了

translation.en: She's near the engine room.
translation.zh: 她在发动机室附近

translation.en: [Callie] Come on, man. Release the hostage. You can still get out of this.
translation.zh: 伙计 放了人质 你还能活命

translation.en: Don't patronize me.
translation.zh: 别想耍我

translation.en: -How good are you with that gun? -Very.
translation.zh: 你的枪法怎么样？ 很好

translation.en: You're gonna be okay, Liz.
translation.zh: 没事的 莉斯

translation.en: -Back off! -[panting]
translation.zh: 退后

translation.en: I've seen every possible ending here.
translation.zh: 我可以看到所有的结局

translation.en: None of them are good for you.
translation.zh: 没一个对你有好处

translation.en: I'll take my chances.
translation.zh: 那我就来试一试

translation.en: One more step, fortune teller, and it definitely won't be good for you.
translation.zh: 再往前走一步 你们都没有好下场

translation.en: You have one way out of this.
translation.zh: 你只有一个下场

translation.en: -That wasn't it. -[grunts]
translation.zh: 这就是结局

translation.en: -[panting] -[Cris] Liz, look at me. It's okay. Look at me. It's over.
translation.zh: 莉斯 看着我 没事了 一切结束了

translation.en: It's over.
translation.zh: 一切都结束了

translation.en: No, it's not.
translation.zh: 不对 还没有

translation.en: The nuclear device was moved. We need to find its exact location.
translation.zh: 他们把核弹移到别的地方了 我们得找到它现在的位置

translation.en: Now, this registers any significant detonation in the Earth's crust.
translation.zh: 这是城市的各大街道交汇图 看看再告诉我看到了什么

translation.en: Take a look. Tell me what you see.
translation.zh: 看看再告诉我看到了什么

translation.en: [Cris] Something's wrong. I...
translation.zh: 不对劲

translation.en: I made a mistake.
translation.zh: 我犯了个错误

translation.en: -What? -I made a mistake.
translation.zh: 什么？ 我犯了个错误

translation.en: -It's happening. -When?
translation.zh: 它爆炸了 -什么时候？-就是现在

translation.en: Now!
translation.zh: -什么时候？-就是现在

translation.en: I got four teams in place. We're just waiting on the road crew.
translation.zh: -14个小队正在待命-好

translation.en: -Ferris. -It's me.
translation.zh: 我是菲尔斯 是我

translation.en: I'll do it, but I have conditions.
translation.zh: 我愿意帮忙 但我有个条件

translation.en: I want her left out of it.
translation.zh: 我不希望她被卷进来

translation.en: I'm sure we can work something out.
translation.zh: 我想我们会做到的

translation.en: -Liz? -[moans]
translation.zh: 莉斯

translation.en: Liz?
translation.zh: 莉斯

translation.en: [groans] Come back to bed.
translation.zh: 到床上来

translation.en: I got to go.
translation.zh: 我得走了

translation.en: Go where?
translation.zh: 去哪？

translation.en: There's something I have to do. I can't put it off any longer.
translation.zh: 必须得有人去做 这是不能逃避的

translation.en: Are you coming back?
translation.zh: 你会回来吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: It may be a week or a month.
translation.zh: 一个星期或者一个月吧

translation.en: But if you can wait, I'll find you.
translation.zh: 如果你愿意等 我会找到你的

translation.en: [Cris] Here's the thing about the future.
translation.zh: 未来就是这么一回事

translation.en: Every time you look at it, it changes because you looked at it.
translation.zh: 每次你看到了未来 未来就会改变 因为你看到了未来

translation.en: And that changes everything else.
translation.zh: 正因为如此其他事情也都发生了变化

translation.en: You ready?
translation.zh: 你准备好了吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好了
